1.0.name: wordpress/automated-registration-of-the-course
1.0.description: [course] use this shortcode anywhere in post/page. This plugin allows you to COURSES: Add, Edit/Update and Delete Courses. A course can be active or deactivated (On hold= not viewable for other than administrators) Participants or people who are interested to intend to these courses must be able: Click on a link or button to register for desired course All data are stored in the database. Tables are marked with its own table prefix not to be mixed with Word Press or other plugins.
